gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.cluster
Class Configuration

java.lang.Object
  gr.ntua.vision.monitoring.cluster.Configuration

public class Configuration
extends java.lang.Object

This manages the monitoring application configuration. It is a singleton object, with its instance accessible only inside the package. ClusterMonitoring singleton should be responsible for distributing it outside.

Field Summary
static java.lang.String CatalogKey
          the variable name for the default key used for storing events in the catalog.
static java.lang.String GlobalCfgKey
          the store key for the configuration.

static java.lang.String ProbeInScripts
          the variable name suffix for whether the script command should be prepended with the scripts folder.
static java.lang.String ProbeNames
          the variable name for the names of the probes.
static java.lang.String ProbeRetries
          the variable name suffix for retries number on fail.

          the variable name suffix for store key name.
